title: PlanFix Reminder System
description: Desktop notification system for PlanFix tasks with modular architecture. Features toast notifications, task categorization (overdue, urgent, current), system tray integration, and built-in diagnostics.

title: MEGA PDF Compressor
description: Web application for batch PDF compression with dual-mode operation: local folders via File System Access API or direct MEGA Cloud integration. Uses iLovePDF API for professional compression.

title: Status Law Website
description: Corporate website for international legal services with multi-language support, client portal integration, and automated lead management system.

title: Portfolio Website
description: Modern, responsive portfolio website showcasing projects and professional experience. Built with vanilla HTML, CSS, and JavaScript for optimal performance.

title: Handwritten Digit Recognition
description: Interactive Streamlit web application for real-time handwritten digit recognition using machine learning. Features interactive canvas, MNIST-trained Random Forest model, and multi-language support.

title: Status Law AI Assistant
description: Intelligent legal chatbot using RAG technology with LangChain and Hugging Face. Features multilingual support, knowledge base management, and multiple LLM models (Llama 2, Zephyr 7B, Mistral 7B).
